QuestData.Title: A Helping Hand
QuestData.Description: I've been pushing and shoving and hammering all morning, but it's hopeless.$B$BThese rocks won't budge!$B$B"It will be a breeze," Grandpa said. "Farming's like breathing!" he said. Maybe for him, but not for me!$B$BHow am I supposed to succeed at this whole FARMING thing if I can't even clear my farm for planting?$B$BHey, wait a minute. You look like you've got some muscle on you.$B$BWould you be willing to help me out? Just until I can catch my breath.
QuestData.CompletionText: I really wasn't cut out for this type of work. I didn't exactly grow up in the country.
QuestData.RewardText: What? You cleared the rocks? That's great news!$B$BMaybe now I can actually start growing something on this farm!
